name: METAWORD
description:
Let’s take all the buzzword of today’s crazy world like metaverse, nft, play-to-earn and goes back to the ultimate human innovation thousands of years ago, language. Or to be precise, the very foundation of it - WORDS. 

And since the theme is duality, within this crazy world of buzzwords and hype-trains, there is a phenomenon even bigger than that. It is called WORDLE, if you haven’t heard of it, I’m sorry you should find better friends. 

So, this a word puzzle game where the goal of this game is to enable you to cheat on WORDLE, so, by playing this game, you will be able to do better on WORDLE. 

How exactly you ask me? Well, I don’t really know but it will probably involve some 450K English words database, AI-infused text prediction and maybe some NFTs too for good measures. #morebuzzwords If we are lucky, we can throw in play-to-earn and make a MILLION bucks-bunny out of it. #nogreed #helphumanity #amIcrazy? 

Okay enough of this BS, I am talking about homonym, homophones, & homographs. And you say, WTF is that s**t? Well, google it. I know I had too. LOL!

Development team

Game programmer - Buzz

Game programmer - Hasyimi Bahrudin

Game Designer - Hoo Yong Jun

Game Artist - Tee Chui Teng

Game Artist -  Vanessa Ong
